name: Flash Basketball new
description:
Flash Basketball new - is a free game in which you can feel yourself in the role of a real basketball player. Throw balls into the basket, make clean shots to feel like the best player of one of the most popular sports games in the world.
"Flash Basketball new" is a cool simulator of basketball for a mobile phone, which is suitable for players of any level. And small novice players, and real professionals, and those who want to cheerfully spend a few hours of free time. However, you should not relax - to have time to shoot a ball, you will have to seriously try and gain skills!
The game is distinguished by intuitive control, colorful, original animation and high-quality thoughtful physics. Stand out among other fairly simple gameplay, which, however, allows you to fully experience the excitement of the impetuous battles on the basketball court.
Features:
• Simple one-touch operation.
• 9 unique unlockable basketballs.
• 5 colorful exclusive arenas.
• Original sound and a separate visual style.
Shoot a Ball!
